appDescription: the official playerunknown's battlegrounds designed exclusively for mobile. play free anywhere, anytime. pubg mobile delivers the most intense free-to-play multiplayer action on mobile. drop in, gear up, and compete. survive epic 100-player classic battles, payload mode and fast-paced 4v4 team deathmatch and zombie modes. survival is key and the last one standing wins. when duty calls, fire at will!
